stride.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a long step you make while you are walking
stride.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Paco reached the door in only three strides.
stride.translation[0].definitions[1].def: an improvement in a situation or in the development of something
stride.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The government has made great strides in reducing poverty.
stride.translation[0].definitions[2].def: the way you walk or run
stride.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to walk quickly with long steps
